name: Totally Real Cult Game
description:
Become a cult leader!  Spread your fake cult to the villages  across the world and gain as much money and influence as possible before age catches up on you. How rich and influential can you get?.

This game was made by two brothers for the brackeys game jam in a week. The music was sourced from free sources, but everything else was made within the week.

Our top score: 1199 Gold and 122680 Influence, see if you can beat it!
